divs: sighting detailson the morning of 6\02\08 at 6:30 am at the window of my hotel room on the 16 fl,of the fallsview casino,i decided the take a few pictures of the falls and surrounding area because of the nice sunny early morning sunrise.my first shot a object can be seen below the crest and to the right of the mist.by my second and third shot the object was gone that fast.i turned to my right a few minutes later to shoot a pic of this tower in the distance and caught this object to the right of the tower.canadian athourities have told me theres a 3,500 foot restricted airspace around the falls and heicopters are also not allowed to fly below the crest or in the mist of the falls.it also appears theres this extended probe pointing at a right angle from the top of this thing-- from one of my zoomed in enhancements.i dont think this is a seagull by no means.
Summary: Object below the crest and in the mist of the falls
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were 2 other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around June 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
